mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO WIP_BOARD ( USER_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_LEVEL, REG_DATE, REG_NO
) VALUES ( #{userNo}, #{title}, #{content}, 1, NOW(), #{userNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_NO as boardNo, B.USER_NO as userNo, U.USER_NAME as userName, B.BOARD_TITLE as title, B.BOARD_CONTENT as content, B.BOARD_COUNT as count, B.REG_DATE as regDate, B.UPD_DATE as updDate, B.BOARD_LEVEL as boardLevel FROM WIP_BOARD B INNER JOIN USER_INFO U ON B.USER_NO=U.USER_NO WHERE B.BOARD_LEVEL = 1

SELECT B.BOARD_NO as boardNo, B.USER_NO as userNo, U.USER_NAME as userName, B.BOARD_TITLE as title, B.BOARD_CONTENT as content, B.BOARD_COUNT as count, B.REG_DATE as regDate, B.UPD_DATE as updDate, B.BOARD_LEVEL as boardLevel FROM WIP_BOARD B INNER JOIN USER_INFO U ON B.USER_NO=U.USER_NO WHERE B.BOARD_LEVEL = 2

SELECT B.BOARD_NO as boardNo, B.USER_NO as userNo, U.USER_NAME as userName, B.BOARD_TITLE as title, B.BOARD_CONTENT as content, B.BOARD_COUNT as count, B.REG_DATE as regDate, B.UPD_DATE as updDate, B.BOARD_LEVEL as boardLevel FROM WIP_BOARD B INNER JOIN USER_INFO U ON B.USER_NO=U.USER_NO WHERE B.BOARD_NO=#{boardNo}
